name: Attention Insight
description:
See how your designs perform before you click "publish"

 

Artificial Intelligence instantly predicts where users will look after engaging with your design so you can save time and avoid fixes after the launch. Don’t doubt even for a moment & prove your design vision!

 

Learn if the CTA button is visible enough, conduct A/B testing, see which object attracts the most attention, and create a better user experience based on data!


🤔 How Does It Work

Select a Figma Frame which you want to test;

Go to: Plugins > Attention Insight > 🎈Analyze design;

Wait for 30 seconds 🕓 and check the results.

 

👑 Features

💎 Attention Heatmaps

💎 Clarity Score


🤖 Technology

Our attention prediction model is based on deep learning and can automatically detect visual attention shifts. More about the technology - https://attentioninsight.com/technology/


🧐 Hey, Don’t You Have an Account Yet? 

No worries! Register for a Free Trial and get 5 free tests per month.

https://app.attentioninsight.com/auth/signin
